actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide that companies of the Corps of Cadets of the United States Military Academy may be commanded by commissioned officers of the Navy, Air Force, and Marine Corps, as well as by commissioned officers of the Army.

summary.text: Permits officers of the Navy, Air Force, and Marine Corps, as well as those of the Army, to command companies of cadets of the U.S. Military Academy for military instruction purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide that companies of the Corps of Cadets of the United States Military Academy may be commanded by commissioned officers of the Navy, Air Force, and Marine Corps, as well as by commissioned officers of the Army.
